sub_title: Inventory Control Analyst, Global - Service Manufacturing at Tesla
summary: Experienced Inventory Control Analyst with a demonstrated history of working in the automotive industry. Skilled in Microsoft Word, Warehouse Operations, Management, Microsoft Excel, and Strategic Planning. Strong operations professional with a Bachelor’s Degree focused in Biology and Physical Education teacher from College of Nyíregyháza,Faculty of Natural Sciences.

school.name: University of Nyíregyháza,Faculty of Natural Sciences

education.degree_name: Web pages setup & maintenance and operation of soft wares
education.field_of_study: Web pages setup & maintenance and operation of soft wares

profile_positions.description:
• Lead the inventory control (IC) cycle count program for Service 
Manufacturing
• Perform audits to ensure cycle count program accuracy and sustainability
• Ensure overall inventory integrity within the department
• Create/prepare monthly, quarterly, and/or annual metrics for cycle counting 
and inventory accuracy
• Provide clear and concise reporting to Finance and to Senior Management
• Coordinate efforts with process engineering to ensure in-process inventory 
accuracy
• Problem-solve inventory discrepancies and utilize the PDCA approach to 
establish and implement countermeasures
• Plan and lead physical inventories (if needed), as well as internal/external 
parts audits
• Train and/or support material handling teams in proper inventory practices 
to maintain accuracy as needed
• Work with cross functional teams to ensure IC practices are being followed 
and lead/support continuous improvement
• Work closely with Finance to ensure corporate compliance and fiscal 
deadlines are met
• Coordinate internal and external requirements as required by regarding 
Foreign Trade Zone (FTZ) regulations
• Document and manage standard work instructions for cycle count and 
inventory adjustment processes.
profile_positions.title: Inventory Control Analyst, Global - Service Manufacturing

profile_positions.description:
•	Full set of responsibilities of the Lead Material Handler
•	Inventory Analysis
-	Identifying and reporting gaps and discrepancies of the inventory levels and the safety stocks.
-	Providing solution alternatives and pointing the risks out. If needed, follow up on the corrective actions.
•	Financial Reporting 
-	Generation of monthly financial reports (balance sheets, cycle count report) related to the inventory levels of Tesla stock parts
-	Providing information about the financial data to global management (US)
•	Dangerous goods shipments
-	Coordination of DG shipments for the Tesla Remanufacturing Team.
profile_positions.title: Lead Remanufacturing Warehouse Coordinator, Global - Service Manufacturing

profile_positions.description:
•   Reorganization of  warehousing procedures and improvement of storage capacity 
•   Management of the daily workflow   
•   Support and manage the work of the Material Handlers
•   Inbound and Outbound freight coordination 
•   Project management in warehousing 
•   Inventory count management 
•   Material procurement, safety stock handling 
•   Operational Trouble shooting 
•	  Respect and apply the 5S methodology at work
•  	Microsoft Outlook, Word, Excel and PowerPoint, Warp, WarpLX, Opex, MES
profile_positions.title: Lead Material Handler

profile_positions.description:
Moerdijk, the Netherlands
•	Screening, registering and allocating the incoming shipments
•	Complete inbound administration
•	In case of faulty products or inbound discrepancies, immediate contact with Customer Service
•	Trouble shooting in the warehouse in case of inventory discrepancies
•	Transporting / delivering special products to their locations on forklift
•	Support in-housing processes
•	Multi-tasking with the different teams or department
•	Grouping and sorting the outbound shipments, finalization of the CMRs
•	Support, coordinate the loading process, problem solving if needed
•	Complete outbound administration
•	Providing continuous feedback on the status of daily activities to the supervising line
•	Respect and apply the 5S methodology at work
•	Comfortable usage of CIEL, Microsoft Outlook, Word, Excel and PowerPoint
profile_positions.title: Inbound – Outbound Operator

profile_positions.description:
•	Preparing, sorting, palletizing, labelling, sealing and loading outbound cargo
•	Transporting / delivering special products to their locations on forklift, reachtruk
•	End-Control / Quality checking
•	Additional support to in-housing
•	Delivering requested products to certain locations via forklift
•	Multi-tasking with the different teams or department
•	Respect and apply the 5S methodology at work
profile_positions.title: End-Control Coordinater
